spells.name: Atonement
spells.description: Removes burden of misdeeds from subject and reverses magical alignment change.

spells.name: Break Enchantment
spells.description: Frees subjects from enchantments, transmutations, and curses.

spells.name: Breath of Life
spells.description: Cures 5d8 damage + 1/level and restores life to recently slain creatures.

spells.name: Command, Greater
spells.description: As command, but affects one subject/level.

spells.name: Commune
spells.description: Deity answers one yes-or-no question/level.

spells.name: Cure Light Wounds, Mass
spells.description: Cures 1d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

spells.name: Dispel Chaos/Evil/Good/Law
spells.description: +4 bonus against attacks.

spells.name: Disrupting Weapon
spells.description: Melee weapon destroys undead.

spells.name: Flame Strike
spells.description: Smites foes with divine fire (1d6/level damage).

spells.name: Hallow
spells.description: Designates location as holy.

spells.name: Inflict Light Wounds, Mass
spells.description: Deals 1d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

spells.name: Insect Plague
spells.description: Wasp swarms attack creatures.

spells.name: Mark of Justice
spells.description: Designates action that triggers curse on subject.

spells.name: Plane Shift
spells.description: As many as 8 subjects travel to another plane.

spells.name: Raise Dead
spells.description: Restores life to subject who died as long as one day/level ago.

spells.name: Righteous Might
spells.description: Your size increases, and you gain bonuses in combat.

spells.name: Scrying
spells.description: Spies on subject from a distance.

spells.name: Slay Living
spells.description: Touch attack deals 12d6 + 1 per level.

spells.name: Spell Resistance
spells.description: Subject gains SR 12 + level.

spells.name: Summon Monster V
spells.description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

spells.name: Symbol of Pain
spells.description: Triggered rune wracks nearby creatures with pain.

spells.name: Symbol of Sleep
spells.description: Triggered rune puts nearby creatures into catatonic slumber.

spells.name: True Seeing
spells.description: Lets you see all things as they really are.

spells.name: Unhallow
spells.description: Designates location as unholy.

spells.name: Wall of Stone
spells.description: Creates a stone wall that can be shaped.
